author: Robbie Graham
title: Feeling Unwell, unable to find contact information to inform my TA of my absence
question:
Hello,
I am feeling unwell for my lab today, section L2D and wanted to contact my TA, Boris Li, to inform him of my absence. I was hoping to contact him to see if I could do the lab online still as I want to stay on top of the content we are covering today.
Thanks,
Robbie Graham
student_answer: Please disregard that message, I had a headache due to dehydration, I will be attending class today.
instructor_answer: Please consult the syllabus for the procedure if you ever have the need to miss class.
